adjectives.description: heartbreaking (comparative more heartbreaking, superlative most heartbreaking)

entries.meaning: That causes great grief, anguish or distress.
The breaking of a heart; great grief, anguish or distress.
examples: One could argue that Eliot's "great heartbreakings" were the overt physical signs of the inner psychological transformations achieved through brainwashing, cultural attack, and epidemic mortality.
